title: Bank credit growth outpaces deposits again, albeit at a sluggish pace
description: Bank credit grew 14% while deposits grew 11% year-on-year, highlighting concerns over asset-liability mismatches. RBI emphasizes the need for banks to address the gap. Governor stresses the importance of maintaining a balance between assets and liabilities.
